57 VolCartesian* LevelSetCartesian::getCartesianMesh() const{

66 double LevelSetCartesian::computeCellIncircle(long id) {
67 
68  BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
69 
70  int dim = m_cartesian->getDimension();
71  std::array<double,3> spacing = m_cartesian->getSpacing();
72  double minSpacing = std::numeric_limits<double>::max() ;
73 
74  for(int i=0; i<dim; ++i){
75  minSpacing = std::min( minSpacing, spacing[i] );
76  }
77 
78  return 0.5*minSpacing;
79 }
80 
86 double LevelSetCartesian::computeCellCircumcircle( long id ) {
87 
88  BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
89 
90  int dim = m_cartesian->getDimension();
91  std::array<double,3> spacing = m_cartesian->getSpacing();
92  double diagonalSquare = 0.0;
93 
94  for(int i=0; i<dim; ++i){
95  diagonalSquare += spacing[i]*spacing[i];
96  }
97 
98  return 0.5*sqrt(diagonalSquare);
99 }
100 
108 bool LevelSetCartesian::intersectCellPlane( long id, const std::array<double,3> &root, const std::array<double,3> &normal ) {
109 
110  std::array<double,3> centroid( computeCellCentroid(id) );
111  std::array<double,3> spacing( m_cartesian->getSpacing() );
112  std::array<double,3> minPoint( centroid -0.5*spacing );
113  std::array<double,3> maxPoint( centroid +0.5*spacing );
114 
115  int dim = m_cartesian->getDimension();
116  return CGElem::intersectPlaneBox( root, normal, minPoint, maxPoint, dim);
117 }
118 
119 }
